beam_coordinate_system_3d.png.description: 3D coordinate system showing beam axis (z) and plane of section (xy) with principal centroidal axes labeled

applied_loads_resultants_system.png.description: Generic system of applied loads showing end section and generic section with internal forces, shear forces, bending moments, and twisting moments labeled with hat symbols

stress_components_internal_actions.png.description: Stress components and internal actions showing coordinate systems, stress tensors, and positive internal action conventions with circular cross-sections

stress_distribution_comparison.png.description: Two cases showing stress distribution comparison - concentrated load versus distributed load on beam cross-sections with stress notation

de_saint_venant_principle_illustration.p.description: Four beam cross-sections showing different loading conditions and internal stress distributions illustrating De Saint Venant principle

beam_3d_surface_face_diagram.png.description: 3D beam diagram showing external surface of body, beam cross-section face, and coordinate system with internal actions labeled

semi_inverse_method_composite_section.pn.description: Semi-inverse method illustration showing coordinate system, stress cube element, and cross-section with material properties for two different materials

composite_section_compatibility.png.description: Composite cross-section diagrams showing two materials with different Poisson ratios and stress distributions for compatibility restoration

deformation_before_after.png.description: Two 3D rectangular blocks showing deformation - before and after - illustrating section shape change under axial stress

cauchy_condition_stress_vectors.png.description: Coordinate system diagrams showing Cauchy condition with stress vectors and unit normal vectors on beam cross-section

linearity_load_amplification.png.description: Two simple beam diagrams showing linearity assumption - distributed load amplification by factor lambda

internal_actions_equivalence.png.description: Beam cross-section diagrams showing internal actions equivalence and stress resultants with moment vectors

dsv_axial_force_solution.png.description: DSV solution for axial force showing rectangular cross-section, coordinate system, strain equations, and displacement field with linear variation along beam axis

dsv_pure_bending_solution.png.description: DSV solution for pure bending showing coordinate systems, moment diagram, strain equations, and displacement field formulation

centroidal_fiber_curvature.png.description: Centroidal fiber deformation diagram showing curved beam axis with rotation angle and curvature illustration

beam_section_deformation.png.description: Beam deformation diagrams showing generic section before and after deformation with beam axis remaining orthogonal to section
